deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.bankNotice1: Always check for the latest active deposit bank details before making a deposit.
deposit.bankNotice2: For using deposit option - Bank Transfer, Please make the transfer before submit the transaction to avoid the transaction is delay.
deposit.bankNotice3: Depositor's ACCOUNT NAME must match with registered full name. We do not encourage transaction made using 3rd party/company account.
deposit.bankNotice4: Please DO NOT fill AONE, # or any sensitive words related to gambling as reference/remark in your online transfer transaction.
deposit.bankNotice5: Please take note that 1x turnover or promotion's specific turnover is required for all deposits made before any withdrawal can be processed.
deposit.bankNotice6: Kindly check with our 24/7 LIVECHAT if your deposit amount is pending for more than 5 minutes.
deposit.ewalletNotice1: Always check for the latest active notice from AONE before making a deposit.
deposit.ewalletNotice2: For using deposit option - Ewallet Deposit, Please follow all the instant transfer step to completed deposit.
deposit.ewalletNotice3: Depositor's ACCOUNT NAME must match with registered full name. We do not encourage transaction made using 3rd party/company account.
deposit.ewalletNotice4: Please DO NOT fill AONE, # or any sensitive words related to gambling as reference/remark in your online transfer transaction.
deposit.ewalletNotice5: Please take note that 1x turnover or promotion's specific turnover is required for all deposits made before any withdrawal can be processed.
deposit.ewalletNotice6: Kindly check with our 24/7 LIVECHAT if your deposit amount has been deducted from bank account but not receive the credit or the transaction is showing pending/reject.
deposit.cryptoNotice1: Always check for the latest active notice from AONE before making a deposit.
deposit.cryptoNotice2: For using deposit option - Crypto Deposit, Please follow all the instant transfer step to completed deposit.
deposit.cryptoNotice3: Please take note that 1x turnover or promotion's specific turnover is required for all deposits made before any withdrawal can be processed.
deposit.cryptoNotice4: Kindly check with our 24/7 LIVECHAT if your deposit amount has been deducted from bank account but not receive the credit or the transaction is showing pending/reject.
deposit.instantNotice1: Always check for the latest active notice from AONE before making a deposit.
deposit.instantNotice2: For using deposit option - Instant Transfer, Please follow all the instant transfer step to completed deposit.
deposit.instantNotice3: Depositor's ACCOUNT NAME must match with registered full name. We do not encourage transaction made using 3rd party/company account.
deposit.instantNotice4: Please DO NOT fill AONE, # or any sensitive words related to gambling as reference/remark in your online transfer transaction.
deposit.instantNotice5: Please take note that 1x turnover or promotion's specific turnover is required for all deposits made before any withdrawal can be processed.
deposit.instantNotice6: Kindly check with our 24/7 LIVECHAT if your deposit amount has been deducted from bank account but not receive the credit or the transaction is showing pending/reject.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal
withdrawal.noBankAccounts: You have not added any bank accounts yet. Please add a bank account to withdraw.
withdrawal.notice1: Withdrawal bank name must match to registered full name. Member unable to withdrawal to 3rd party bank account.
withdrawal.notice2: Please make sure already achieve the 1x turnover of deposit amount before submit the withdrawal transaction.
withdrawal.notice3: Please make sure the bank account name & bank account number is correct before submitted the withdrawal transaction.
withdrawal.notice4: Some game provider requires up to 30 minutes of report sync time, kindly submit the withdrawal transaction after that, to avoid system auto reject.
withdrawal.notice5: Once you have successfully submitted your withdrawal transaction, just leave it to our team to process your transactions as speedy as possible. If more than 10 minutes, let us know by contacting our Customer Service support. They will assist you 24/7 anytime.

about.title: About AONE
about.tagline: play your way, earn your pay
about.paragraph1: Aone Global Gaming is a premier online gaming platform that offers a wide range of games, including casino games, sports betting, p2p, fishing and live games. Our platform is designed to provide a seamless and immersive gaming experience for players of all levels.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to provide our customers with the best possible gaming experience, with a focus on security, transparency, and fairness. We believe that trust is the foundation of any successful gaming platform, and we are committed to maintaining the highest levels of security and fairness in all of our games.
about.paragraph3: At Aone Global Gaming, we are passionate about providing our customers with a wide range of games and betting options, from classic casino games to the latest live games and sports betting options. Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for players to find their favorite games and place bets with ease.
about.paragraph4: We are dedicated to providing our customers with exceptional customer service, and our team is available 24/7 to assist with any questions or concerns. We believe that our success is based on the satisfaction of our customers, and we are committed to delivering the highest level of service to ensure that our customers are always satisfied.
about.paragraph5: Thank you for choosing Aone Global Gaming, and we look forward to providing you with the best possible gaming experience.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to AONE Global Gaming. These terms and conditions ("Terms") apply to your use of our website and any associated services. By using our website, you agree to these Terms, which form a legal agreement between you and us. Please read them carefully before using our website.
terms.eligibilityContent: You must be at least 18 years old to use our website. By using our website, you confirm that you are of legal age to gamble in your jurisdiction.
terms.userAccountsContent: To use certain features of our website, you may be required to register an account. You must provide accurate and complete information when registering an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your username and password. You must not share your account information with anyone else. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.depositsWithdrawalsContent: You may deposit funds into your account using one of the methods available on our website. We may require you to provide additional information before we can process your deposit. We may charge fees for certain deposit methods. Deposit by using internet bank transfer required using the same bank holder name which is registered during registration of your account, any deposit which is not meet these requirement shall be rejected. You may request a withdrawal of funds from your account at any time, subject to our withdrawal policy. We may require you to provide additional information before we can process your withdrawal. We may charge fees for certain withdrawal methods.
terms.wageringContent: You may use funds in your account to place bets on our website. You are responsible for ensuring that you have sufficient funds in your account to cover any bets placed. You may only place bets with funds that are legally yours and not subject to any legal or equitable claim. We reserve the right to void any bets placed with funds that do not meet these requirements. Aone reserved the right to confiscate user's credit and ban user's account without notice and evidence to proof if player is found abnormal betting or group betting behaviour.
terms.bonusesRewardsContent: We may offer bonuses, promotions and rewards from time to time. These are subject to their own terms and conditions, which will be provided to you at the time of the offer. You are responsible for understanding and complying with the terms and conditions of any bonuses or promotions that you accept.
terms.prohibitedConductContent: You must not use our website for any unlawful or fraudulent activity, or for any activity that may harm us or our users. You must not interfere with the operation of our website or attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if we believe that you have engaged in prohibited conduct.
terms.terminationContent: We may terminate your account for any reason, including for violation of these Terms.
terms.changesToTermsContent: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or by posting a notice on our website. Your continued use of our website after the effective date of any changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.
